title: dumpsys - Get diagnostic output for all system services
description: dumpsys: Get information about Android system services. This command can only be used through `adb shell`. (Get diagnostic output for all system services)

title: dumpsys - Get diagnostic output for a specific system service
description: dumpsys: Get information about Android system services. This command can only be used through `adb shell`. (Get diagnostic output for a specific system service)

title: dumpsys - List all services `dumpsys` can give information about
description: dumpsys: Get information about Android system services. This command can only be used through `adb shell`. (List all services `dumpsys` can give information about)

title: dumpsys - List service-specific arguments for a service
description: dumpsys: Get information about Android system services. This command can only be used through `adb shell`. (List service-specific arguments for a service)

title: dumpsys - Exclude a specific service from the diagnostic output
description: dumpsys: Get information about Android system services. This command can only be used through `adb shell`. (Exclude a specific service from the diagnostic output)

title: dumpsys - Specify a [t]imeout period in seconds (defaults to 10s)
description: dumpsys: Get information about Android system services. This command can only be used through `adb shell`. (Specify a [t]imeout period in seconds (defaults to 10s))

title: am - Start the activity with a specific component and package [n]ame
description: am: Android activity manager. (Start the activity with a specific component and package [n]ame)

title: am - Start an intent [a]ction and pass [d]ata to it
description: am: Android activity manager. (Start an intent [a]ction and pass [d]ata to it)

title: am - Start an activity matching a specific [a]ction and [c]ategory
description: am: Android activity manager. (Start an activity matching a specific [a]ction and [c]ategory)

title: am - Convert an intent to a URI
description: am: Android activity manager. (Convert an intent to a URI)

title: wm - Display the physical size of an Android device's screen
description: wm: Show information about the screen of an Android device. This command can only be used through `adb shell`. (Display the physical size of an Android device's screen)

title: wm - Display the physical density of an Android device's screen
description: wm: Show information about the screen of an Android device. This command can only be used through `adb shell`. (Display the physical density of an Android device's screen)

title: screencap - Take a screenshot
description: screencap: Take a screenshot of a mobile display. This command can only be used through `adb shell`. (Take a screenshot)

title: getprop - Display information about Android system properties
description: getprop: Show information about Android system properties. (Display information about Android system properties)

title: getprop - Display information about a specific property
description: getprop: Show information about Android system properties. (Display information about a specific property)

title: getprop - Display the SDK API level
description: getprop: Show information about Android system properties. (Display the SDK API level)

title: getprop - Display the Android version
description: getprop: Show information about Android system properties. (Display the Android version)

title: getprop - Display the Android device model
description: getprop: Show information about Android system properties. (Display the Android device model)

title: getprop - Display the OEM unlock status
description: getprop: Show information about Android system properties. (Display the OEM unlock status)

title: getprop - Display the MAC address of the Android's Wi-Fi card
description: getprop: Show information about Android system properties. (Display the MAC address of the Android's Wi-Fi card)

title: bugreportz - Generate a complete zipped bug report of an Android device
description: bugreportz: Generate a zipped Android bug report. This command can only be used through `adb shell`. (Generate a complete zipped bug report of an Android device)

title: bugreportz - Show the progress of a running `bugreportz` operation
description: bugreportz: Generate a zipped Android bug report. This command can only be used through `adb shell`. (Show the progress of a running `bugreportz` operation)

title: bugreportz - Write the content of an Android bug report to `stdout`
description: bugreportz: Generate a zipped Android bug report. This command can only be used through `adb shell`. (Write the content of an Android bug report to `stdout`)

title: bugreportz - Display help
description: bugreportz: Generate a zipped Android bug report. This command can only be used through `adb shell`. (Display help)

title: bugreportz - Display version
description: bugreportz: Generate a zipped Android bug report. This command can only be used through `adb shell`. (Display version)

title: logcat - Display system logs
description: logcat: Dump a log of system messages, including stack traces when an error occurred, and information messages logged by applications. (Display system logs)

title: logcat - Write system logs to a [f]ile
description: logcat: Dump a log of system messages, including stack traces when an error occurred, and information messages logged by applications. (Write system logs to a [f]ile)

title: logcat - Display lines that match a `regex`
description: logcat: Dump a log of system messages, including stack traces when an error occurred, and information messages logged by applications. (Display lines that match a `regex`)

title: logcat - Display logs for a specific PID
description: logcat: Dump a log of system messages, including stack traces when an error occurred, and information messages logged by applications. (Display logs for a specific PID)

title: logcat - Display logs for the process of a specific package
description: logcat: Dump a log of system messages, including stack traces when an error occurred, and information messages logged by applications. (Display logs for the process of a specific package)

title: dalvikvm - Start a specific Java program
description: dalvikvm: Android Java virtual machine. (Start a specific Java program)

title: pm - List all installed apps
description: pm: Display information about apps on an Android device. (List all installed apps)

title: pm - List all installed [s]ystem apps
description: pm: Display information about apps on an Android device. (List all installed [s]ystem apps)

title: pm - List all installed [3]rd-party apps
description: pm: Display information about apps on an Android device. (List all installed [3]rd-party apps)

title: pm - List apps matching specific keywords
description: pm: Display information about apps on an Android device. (List apps matching specific keywords)

title: pm - Display a path of the APK of a specific app
description: pm: Display information about apps on an Android device. (Display a path of the APK of a specific app)

title: cmd - [l]ist all running services
description: cmd: Android service manager. ([l]ist all running services)

title: cmd - Call a specific service
description: cmd: Android service manager. (Call a specific service)

description: cmd: Android service manager. (Call a service with specific arguments)

title: input - Send an event code for a single character to an Android device
description: input: Send event codes or touchscreen gestures to an Android device. This command can only be used through `adb shell`. (Send an event code for a single character to an Android device)

title: input - Send a text to an Android device (`%s` represents spaces)
description: input: Send event codes or touchscreen gestures to an Android device. This command can only be used through `adb shell`. (Send a text to an Android device (`%s` represents spaces))

title: input - Send a single tap to an Android device
description: input: Send event codes or touchscreen gestures to an Android device. This command can only be used through `adb shell`. (Send a single tap to an Android device)

title: input - Send a swipe gesture to an Android device
description: input: Send event codes or touchscreen gestures to an Android device. This command can only be used through `adb shell`. (Send a swipe gesture to an Android device)

title: input - Send a long press to an Android device using a swipe gesture
description: input: Send event codes or touchscreen gestures to an Android device. This command can only be used through `adb shell`. (Send a long press to an Android device using a swipe gesture)

title: settings - List the settings in the `global` namespace
description: settings: Get information about the Android OS. (List the settings in the `global` namespace)

description: settings: Get information about the Android OS. (Get a value of a specific setting)

description: settings: Get information about the Android OS. (Set a specific value of a setting)

description: settings: Get information about the Android OS. (Delete a specific setting)

title: bugreport - Display a complete bug report of an Android device
description: bugreport: Show an Android bug report. This command can only be used through `adb shell`. (Display a complete bug report of an Android device)
